Text: I'm guessing this isn't the Ultimate Rekall Edition. which has 10 times better video quality? Or is this the poor 2006 release?

I'm guessing that this is a BR Rip of the original release, not the July 2012 release referred to as the "Mind Bending" release or the "Ultimate Rekall" edition...  Can someone confirm ??
This is the real thing. 2012 version is a classic hollywood remake garbage.
I recently purchased the MIND BENDING EDITION and, other than the extras, you may as well search for the Optimum UK blu 2008 release - color, black levels and overall PQ is MUCH better.
